Comments: `Standard Tesselation Language <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/STL_(file_format)>`_ for 3d models (geometry only; no textures).
`Polygon File Format <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PLY_(file_format)>`_ for 3d models (geometry only; no textures)

`Wavefront OBJ <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wavefront_.obj_file>`_ for 3d models. For CollectiveAccess version 1.7.x only geometry is supported. From version 1.8 support for textures specified using .mtl "sidecar" files is provided.
`Graphics Language Transport Format <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GlTF>`_ for 3d models. Available from version 1.8. Texture support is provided using "sidecar" files.
